quality_metrics.name: License
quality_metrics.feedback:
chef_handler does not have a valid open source license.
Acceptable licenses include Apache-2.0, apachev2, MIT, mit, GPL-2.0, gplv2, GPL-3.0, gplv3.

quality_metrics.feedback: chef_handler should declare what platform(s) it supports.
